name: @cyyynthia/pronoundb-extension
description: chrome and firefox extension for pronoundb
author: Cynthia <cynthia@cynthia.dev>

scripts.bundle: microbundle build -i src/index.js --no-compress --external none --sourcemap false -f iife -o dist/script.js
scripts.watch: microbundle watch -i src/index.js --no-compress --external none --sourcemap false -f iife -o dist/script.js
